Start your career in tech.
Apply for the courseStarts 1. September 2014!

How?
Learn by building 12 real-life projects. Broken down into weekly challenges.
When?
Starts September 2014, runs for 12 months. Each month is one separate unit.
Price?
$30 per month - cancel any time.

Who is this course for?

Do you want to join the new economy while staying in your current job? Then this is the course for you! I will teach you how to master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more. So you can do what I did and create a thriving career for yourself in the growing tech sector!

This will be thePioneersintake, I am looking for the first 50 people who really want to change their careers in the coming months!

The course will start in only, apply now to reserve your seat!

What will you learn?

My goal is to teach you all you need to get a job in tech. We will start with creating websites, after that we will be building Single-page applications, and finish the course with server and database programming in Node.js and MongoDB. Once a week you will get a task and instructions from me into your inbox. Every week we will learn a new concept and apply it right away to a concrete real life project. Each month we start a new project. By the end of the year you will have a portfolio of 12 projects and a Github account full of open source code to apply for your first job in tech.

The course will start in only, apply now to reserve your seat!

About me

In the past two years I changed my career and went from architecture into tech by teaching myself how to code and got a job in a great tech startup - the wonderful: Escape The City. The goal for this course is simple: what took me 2 years (including one year of bad paid part time work) I'll teach you how to do in one - without quitting your job!
